product.longDescription:
• Weight: 6.72 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 19.25" x 14.75" x 9.0"
Overall Dimensions: 22.5" x 14.0" x 9.5"
product.shortDescription: Explore the Dark side with Star Wars x American Tourister Hardside Carry-On!  This bag will show off your personality while giving you all the bells and whistles you need while traveling.

tooltip: Luggage is made from a vacuum-formed or pressure-formed shell. Strong ABS plastic, a temperature-resistant, highly impact-resistant material, is combined with a textured finish for the classic hardside look.
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Star Wars Darth Vader Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
product.headlineDescription:
Feature Highlights:
✓ ABS printed shell
✓ Expands 1.5"
✓ ID Tag included

Details:
  • Overall Dimensions: 22.5" x 14.0" x 9.5"
  • Weight: 6.72 lbs

compareSpecifications.name: USB Port
compareSpecifications.tooltip: Built in USB port lets you power devices on the go. Battery sold separately

compareSpecifications.tooltip: Strap that fits over most upright luggage handles for easy transportation
